title: Wholesale prescription drug distributor license
context: [ยง461-8.6] Wholesale prescription drug distributor license. It shall be unlawful for any person to operate, maintain, open, change location, or establish any wholesale prescription drug distribution business within the State without first having obtained a license from the board. [L 1992, c 196, ยง3] Cross References Regulation of wholesale prescription drug distributors, see chapter 328, pt VII.
